snippet: An offshoot of Antica Pesa in the Trastevere district of Rome opens in Williamsburg, Marco Polo Ristorante reopens in Carroll Gardens and more.
abstract: Restaurants Antica Pesa Williamsburg, Birdbath, Cocotte, L'Apicio, and S Prime open in New York City; Marco Polo Ristorante reopens in Brooklyn after extensive makeover.
lead_paragraph: An offshoot of Antica Pesa in the Trastevere district of Rome opens in Williamsburg, Marco Polo Ristorante reopens in Carroll Gardens and more.

headline.seo: Antica Pesa Williamsburg Opens, Marco Polo Ristorante Reopens and More
